Title: Prohibits single-agent dual agency, requires representation agreements, and prohibits mandatory broker's fees in residential real property transactions
Summary: Prohibits single-agent dual agency; requires representation agreements; allows broker's fee negotiations; prohibits mandatory broker's fees in residential real property transactions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to prohibiting single-agent dual agency, requiring representation agreements, allowing buyers and tenants to negotiate broker fees, and prohibiting landlords, lessors, sub-lessors, and grantors from requiring a tenant to pay brokers' fees as a condition of entering into a lease agreement
